description: This Java class 'UserService' provides user profile management operations such as retrieving, updating, and deleting user profiles within a Spring application. It interacts with user repository, handles exceptions, and manages password encoding.

classes.name: UserService
classes.description: Service class for user profile operations, annotated as a Spring Service with required args constructor injected repositories and encoders.

methods.name: getUserProfile
methods.description: Retrieves user profile by ID, throws NotFoundException if user does not exist.

methods.name: updateUserProfile
methods.description: Updates user profile information such as full name and password, with validation and exception handling.

methods.name: deleteUser
methods.description: Deletes a user by ID, throws NotFoundException if user does not exist.
